/** Mixins */
.component-quick-links { width: 100vw; position: relative; left: calc(-1 * (100vw - 100%) / 2); background-color: #F2F5F7; display: block; margin-top: 3.5rem; }

.component-quick-links .component-quick-links__title { font-family: 'Merriweather Bold'; font-weight: 700; text-align: center; padding: 3.5rem 0; margin: 0; }

.component-quick-links .component-quick-links__content { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr)); justify-items: center; grid-gap: 1rem; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 1140px; padding: 0 0 3.5rem; }

@media (min-width: 1679px) { .component-quick-links .component-quick-links__content { max-width: 1680px; } }
